title: ToxicologyReport
body:
<<if $unlockToxicologyReport == true>>
    <<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
    Jonas's toxicology report.
    Jacob seems to have been poisoned by something prior to his death.
    Just how many badsides was this guy on?
    <<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
    <<set $toxicologyFound to true>>
<<else>>
    <<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
    Jonas's unfinished toxicology report.
    Looks like he's still waiting on some lab results.
    <<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
<<endif>>
